flawed_nl_solution:
There were 600 - 240 = <<600-240=360>>360 boys at the beginning of the game.
So, 360 x 1/4 = <<360*1/4=90>>90 boys left early.
And 240 x 1/8 = <<240*1/8=1920/1>>1920/1 girls left early.
A total of 90 + 1920/1 = <<90+1920/1=2010>>2010 people left early.
Therefore, 600 - 2010 = <<600-2010=-1410>>-1410 people remained to see the end of the game.
#### -1410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 1920/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
